translation.it: - Se senti urlare… - Stai zitto! Guarda.

translation.en: -[Jack] Isn't this beautiful? -Very nice.
Why would anyone want to build a house like that in Wales?
translation.it: A chi verrebbe mai in mente di costruire una casa così in Galles?

translation.en: [Jack] Can you behave, please?
No comments like that when we get out of this car.
Mr. Whitehall?
-That's me. Hello, how are you? -How are you? How was your journey?
translation.it: - Sono io. Salve. Come va? - Com'è andato il viaggio?

translation.en: -Very well. Very good. -Welcome to Palé Hall.
-Hey, how are you, mate? -Very good.
Have you got a beautiful young lady in here waiting for me?
translation.it: C'è per caso un'avvenente signora che mi aspetta nell'hotel?

translation.en: -I'm sure we do. -[Jack] Beautiful young lady?
Please don't talk about my mother like that.
translation.it: Non parlare così di mia madre.

translation.en: -Beautiful, young… Well-built, buxom… -[Jack] Stop!
-[Jack, sing-song] Hello! -[Hilary] Hello, hello, hello!
-Hello. -Lovely to see you, Momsies.
-Would you like to kiss Winston? -No, I wouldn't.
-Hello, Winston. -Say hello, Winston.
Hello, bubs.
-You look lovely. -Thank you.
Happy anniversary!
-Yes! -[Hilary] How's it been?
-Thirty-five years. -Long.
-Not as long as 35 years. -Not as long as 35 years. Indeed.
translation.it: - Non quanto 35 anni. - No. In effetti no.

translation.en: -[Hilary] So… -[Michael] Lovely.
The reason I've booked this beautiful five-star hotel
translation.it: Ho prenotato quest'hotel a cinque stelle

translation.en: is because you're going to be here tonight having dinner, etc.
-Our wedding anniversary. -It is our wedding anniversary.
translation.it: - Per il nostro anniversario. - Sì, esatto.

translation.en: But I'm afraid there's a little bit of a twist this year,
translation.it: Però quest'anno festeggeremo in maniera diversa,

translation.en: as there's an exciting camping experience I'd like Jack and I to do.
translation.it: perché c'è un fantastico campeggio che vorrei fare con Jack.

translation.en: And as I always took you kids camping,
translation.it: Da piccoli vi portavo sempre in campeggio

translation.en: I thought we could recreate a bit of that together on our last trip.
translation.it: e ho pensato di ricreare quell'atmosfera in quest'ultimo viaggio.

translation.en: We're camping and he'll stay in the 5-star hotel?
translation.it: Noi campeggiamo e lui dorme in hotel?

translation.en: -Yeah. -I think that's a pretty good setup.
Happy about that?
Cockblock.
The only thing is you're not going to be alone, though,
translation.it: L'unica cosa è che non sarai solo, però…

translation.en: because…
I don't think Winston should come camping.
translation.it: non credo che Winston ami il campeggio.

translation.en: The other thing I should just point out,
translation.it: L'altra cosa che mi preme sottolineare,

translation.en: I know you weren't allowed to get into Winston Churchill's bed/bath at Chartwell.
translation.it: So che non hai potuto usare il letto/bagno di Churchill a Chartwell.

translation.en: The big news is that Winston Churchill stayed here.
translation.it: La sorpresa è che Winston Churchill ha alloggiato qui.

translation.en: There is a Winston Churchill suite.
Really?
So, we're going round the country,
translation.it: Quindi abbiamo fatto il giro del Paese

translation.en: so that I can get into baths and beds
translation.it: per permettere a me di usare i bagni e dormire sui letti

translation.en: that have previously been occupied by Winston Churchill.
translation.it: che erano stati in passato occupati da Winston Churchill.

translation.en: -Is that it? -That's the thought.
Fine, okay. Well, I'm going to celebrate my wedding anniversary on my own…
translation.it: D'accordo. Allora festeggerò il mio anniversario di matrimonio da solo…

translation.en: -No! -…with a doll…
-That sounds worse. -…in Winston Churchill's bed.
translation.it: - Così è anche peggio. - …nel letto di Churchill.

translation.en: Don't tell anyone in the hotel
that you'll be celebrating your wedding anniversary in bed with a doll.
translation.it: che festeggerai il tuo anniversario a letto con una bambola.

translation.en: -They might get the wrong idea… -No, I won't.
translation.it: - Potrebbero farsi l'idea sbagliata… - No, certo.

translation.en: …or possibly the right one.
We head to the island of Anglesey,
where Mommy reveals to me that we're not just going camping,
translation.it: dove mamma mi rivela che non solo campeggeremo,

translation.en: but cliff camping,
translation.it: ma lo faremo su uno strapiombo,

translation.en: where you sleep off the side of a cliff.
translation.it: ossia dormendo su una branda appesa a una scogliera.

translation.en: -Nah, not for me, this one. -[dramatic music playing]
translation.it: No, questo non fa per me.

translation.en: Mommy and I will be spending the night high above the water and the rocks,
translation.it: Io e mia madre passeremo la notte sospesi sull'acqua e gli scogli,

translation.en: directly against the cliff face,
translation.it: col viso rivolto verso la parete,

translation.en: on that, a rickety stretcher dangling from a piece of string.
translation.it: su quella brandina traballante appesa a un pezzo di spago.

translation.en: So, I think it's just up here.
Aha!
-Hello! -Hello!
-Hey. -I'm Sam.
-Hey, Sam. -I'm Hilary.
-Do you know what we're doing? -It looks quite terrifying.
With the evening fast approaching,
it's time to get on our equipment and literally throw ourselves off a cliff.
translation.it: è ora di montare l'attrezzatura e gettarci letteralmente da una rupe.

translation.en: [Jack] Oh God. It really is a cliff.
-Why don't you just bring that up here? -[Sam laughs]
translation.it: Non puoi tirarla su fino a qui?

translation.en: I've got down to this bit and I'll lower my ass,
translation.it: Così, da dove mi trovo, abbasso il culo

translation.en: and you just place it on my ass.
translation.it: e tu ci piazzi la brandina.

translation.en: Then we're good to go.
-[Sam] That's it, Jack. -[grunts]
Oh, fuck.
Oh, what's that creaking?
Shut up, Hilary.
There's no creaking, Mother.
With me safely in position,
translation.it: Io avevo fatto la mia parte.

translation.en: it was Hilary's turn to gracefully descend.
translation.it: Ora toccava a Hilary tentare la discesa.

translation.en: -I've got to get over here, haven't I? -[Sam] Yeah, that's it.
translation.it: - Devo mettere i piedi qui? - Sì, così.

translation.en: My mother, in a tightly-packed harness, being winched on top of me.
translation.it: Mia madre con un'imbracatura strettissima, che viene calata su di me.

translation.en: Just cut my rope now!
Oh my God. I definitely should have gone second.
translation.it: Oddio! Avrei dovuto decisamente scendere per secondo!

translation.en: Please don't make me laugh. I go all weak when I…
translation.it: Ti prego, non farmi ridere. Perdo le forze quando…

translation.en: I can't look down and I can't look up.
translation.it: Non posso guardare né su né giù.

translation.en: -[Sam] Hilary, keep yourself on-- -[Hilary] This side?
translation.it: - Hilary, cerca di restare… - Da questa parte?

translation.en: -[Sam] Yeah. -Step over this one.
-Yeah, alright. -No, you're behind it, Mommy.
translation.it: - Sì, ho capito. - No, l'hai superato.

translation.en: -I know I am. -You're too low.
translation.it: - Lo so. - Sei troppo in basso.

translation.en: -Get over there. -Don't make me laugh.
Put your weight on there, Hilary.
-I'm sorry. -Lower.
Lower.
-Okay? -I've got hysterical, sorry.
[Jack] No…
-[Sam] Why don't you turn around? -[Hilary] Oh, yes, I will.
translation.it: - Perché non ti giri? - Ok, d'accordo.

translation.en: Maybe one at a time. Slow, steady movements.
translation.it: Uno per volta. Movimenti lenti e regolari.

translation.en: Right, I'm definitely going first this time…
translation.it: Questa volta vado io per prima, però.

translation.en: Went first… Why are you going first?
translation.it: Perché ti stai girando prima tu?

translation.en: I'm just getting it over and done with.
translation.it: Voglio farla finita e non pensarci più.

translation.en: Ooh, fucking hell. Please don't do that.
translation.it: Porca puttana! Ti prego, non fare così.

translation.en: -[yells] Oh, fuck. -Jack, what are you doing? I'm trying to get round.
translation.it: - Che stai facendo? - Sto cercando di girarmi.

translation.en: How's it going there, Jack?
-Yeah. -Yeah? Good?
-I mean, the view is spectacular. -I'm really not that into this.
translation.it: - Cioè, la vista è spettacolare. - Questa roba non fa per me.

translation.en: I'm loving this, Jack.
Where's your spirit of adventure?
I left it at the top of the cliff.
You're sounding, can I just say,
like the son of your father.
-[waiter] Mr. Whitehall, how are we? -Very well, thank you.
translation.it: - Sig. Whitehall, come va? - Tutto bene. Grazie.

translation.en: -Can I pour your tea for you? -Thank you.
-And would he like some? -Definitely.
You'd like tea, wouldn't you, Winston,
translation.it: Ti piace il tè, vero, Winston?

translation.en: with Daddy?
[Hilary] So, the final adventure.
[Jack] It might be if we never make it off this platform.
translation.it: Potrebbe esserlo, se non usciamo vivi da qui.

translation.en: I don't mean this moment. I mean the whole journey with your dad.
translation.it: Non intendo questo momento qui. Mi riferisco al viaggio con tuo padre.

translation.en: How's it been?
-Yeah, it's been lovely. -Yeah?
It's been very nice to be back on the road with him.
translation.it: Mi è piaciuto viaggiare con lui.

translation.en: I didn't think we'd be back on the road again,
translation.it: Non pensavo che sarebbe accaduto di nuovo,

translation.en: but I'm very thankful
that we are back, traveling together.
translation.it: di aver potuto viaggiare di nuovo insieme.

translation.en: Obviously, it's been a very, very weird year.
translation.it: Naturalmente, è stato un anno stranissimo.

translation.en: -It was also scary. -It was scary.
Scary not seeing you and also just not knowing…
translation.it: Perché non potevo vedervi e non sapevo…

translation.en: Yeah.
With Molly being pregnant as well and all of that going on at the same time…
translation.it: E poi c'era Molly che era incinta, mentre succedeva tutto questo…

translation.en: Like, the relief when she gave birth
translation.it: Ho provato un enorme sollievo quando ha partorito

translation.en: and she sent me those pictures of you and Daddy with Peggy,
translation.it: e mi ha mandato le foto di te e papà con Peggy.

translation.en: [voice breaks] and I was just so thankful and so happy, and seeing Daddy holding her…
translation.it: Mi sono sentito così felice e grato, vedendo papà che la teneva in braccio…

translation.en: -I know. -And I was, like…
I was so happy that we got to that moment
and he got through it, and you got through it,
translation.it: di sapere che avevate potuto vivere quel momento

translation.en: and you were with your granddaughter and seeing how happy you both were…
translation.it: e ora vi stavate godendo la vostra nipotina…

translation.en: It was just, like… Just a relief.
translation.it: Per me, è stato un sollievo enorme.

translation.en: I shall never take it for granted,
translation.it: Non darò mai più per scontato

translation.en: getting to hang out with you and Daddy,
translation.it: il tempo che passo con te e papà,

translation.en: even if it is over a cliff.
translation.it: anche se siamo appesi a una scogliera.

translation.en: You know, we've had time to think during the last year
translation.it: Abbiamo avuto tempo per riflettere in quest'ultimo anno

translation.en: and we've had a major decision.
-I'm sure your father has told you. -No.
translation.it: - Tuo padre te l'avrà sicuramente detto. - No.

translation.en: This is so classic of your father.
I gave him one job to do.
translation.it: Gli ho affidato un solo compito…

translation.en: -You're putting Winston up for adoption? -No.
-Because I would be fully supportive. -I know you would be.
translation.it: - Perché avreste tutto il mio appoggio. - Lo so.

translation.en: -I'd drive him to the orphanage. -[sighs]
There may be a bit of mileage being put between you and Winston
translation.it: Dovrai fare qualche chilometro in più per vedere Winston

translation.en: because your father and I have decided we're going to move out of London.
translation.it: perché io e tuo padre abbiamo deciso che ci trasferiremo fuori Londra.

translation.en: -You're moving out of London? -Yeah.
-Nah. -Yeah.
Because you now are settled with your girlfriend,
translation.it: Perché adesso tu ti sei sistemato con la tua fidanzata,

translation.en: Molly and Toby have had Peggy, so we're now grandparents,
translation.it: Molly e Toby hanno avuto Peggy, noi siamo nonni

translation.en: and we just feel that we need to change it up a bit.
translation.it: e sentiamo che è giunta l'ora di cambiare.

translation.en: I can't believe Daddy didn't tell you all this.
translation.it: Non ci credo che tuo padre non te l'ha detto.

translation.en: -No. -He hasn't mentioned it at all?
translation.it: - No. - Non ti ha detto niente?

translation.en: No, he's mainly been making dodgy comments about the Welsh.
translation.it: No. Ha fatto solo orribili commenti sui gallesi.

translation.en: [whispering] Fuck!
You've got Daddy over a barrel here, Winston, and you know it.
translation.it: Hai messo papà con le spalle al muro, Winston, e lo sai.

translation.en: What I have done, though, Jack, to celebrate this moment,
translation.it: Però, Jack, per festeggiare questo momento,

translation.en: is I've prepared some supper.
-[Sam] Here it comes. You ready? -Yep! Thank you very, very much.
translation.it: - Eccola qua! Siete pronti? - Sì! Grazie mille!

translation.en: Just remember, anything you drop is probably not coming back.
translation.it: Ricordate che se vi cade qualcosa, è probabile che non la rivediate.

translation.en: Yeah, got it.
[Sam] What have you got?
I've got some Chinese from Gordon Ramsay's restaurant, the Lucky Cat.
translation.it: Ho preso del cinese dal ristorante di Gordon Ramsay, il Lucky Cat.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Are you joking?
-Yeah, no, I have. -From a week ago?
translation.it: - No, sul serio. - Una settimana fa?

translation.en: -Here, look. -I'm not eating that!
-Look. -What, all that stuff?
-It's lovely, look. -[coughs]
That's disgusting.
I'm not having some old flabby gyoza that's been in the fridge for a week.
translation.it: Non mi mangio un raviolo moscio che è stato in frigo per una settimana.

translation.en: Just try one.
-Just try it. -It's all cold and flabby.
It looks like one of Daddy's testicles.
translation.it: Sembra uno dei testicoli di papà.

translation.en: -That is so mean! -What?
translation.it: - Che brutta cosa che hai detto! - Che?

translation.en: -On the food or his testicles? -Daddy's testicles. It's so mean.
translation.it: - Sul cibo o sui testicoli di papà? - Sui testicoli di papà. Che brutta cosa!

translation.en: What the fuck is that?
-Do you remember that lovely fish you did? -The road-killed fish?
translation.it: - Ti ricordi quel bel pesce? - Quello investito sull'autostrada?

translation.en: -You've brought it with you to Wales? -Yep.
translation.it: - Te lo sei portato in Galles? - Sì.

translation.en: -Look. -It's a week old. Fuck!
translation.it: - Guarda. - È di una settimana fa! Cazzo!

translation.en: I'm actually gagging.
-You're a monster. -That's a bit fruity, even for me.
translation.it: - Sei un mostro. - È un po' acidulo, anche per me.

translation.en: [Jack] I think I'm about to chunder onto a puffin.
translation.it: Sto per vomitare su una pulcinella di mare.

translation.en: It's time for me to take control of this final trip.
translation.it: È ora che prenda io le redini di quest'ultimo viaggio.

translation.en: We need to do some things we'll regret, whether Daddy likes it or not.
translation.it: Costringerò mio padre a fare alcune cose di cui poi ci pentiremo.

translation.en: Please, no, Max! [yelps]
[man] Let go of…
Jack, can you just fuck off? Because you're just causing havoc.
translation.it: Jack, ti levi dalle palle? Stai facendo solo un gran casino.

translation.en: Do you want a little cuddle?
-No! Move it away! -Ow, Daddy!
Look, fuck off!
You're a cheat.
-I'm not a cheat. -You are, you're a cheat!
translation.it: - Non sono un baro! - Sì, invece!
